ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Jewelry
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That s for sure!!  First time I noticed it was when my bard had built up about 140 points with nothing at all to spend them on!!!  I used it to increase
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 31 Oct 2000 12:08:21 -0800, Shawn Alley <shawna@...> wrote:

>train your 21 points from the guildmaster is the best way to go. You'll
>have so many points you won't know what to do witht them eventually
>
>Azara Sparklemeister, Sacrament
>39th enchanter, Povar

That's for sure!! First time I noticed it was when my bard had built
up about 140 points with nothing at all to spend them on!!! I used it
to increase swimming skill higher and then ran out of money!! Still
got over 80 points I think after learning languages, basic trade
skills etc. Sheesh!

As for an enchanter type, well I now always use as many skill points
as I can on research to make sure it's maxxed on guildmaster training.
Still needs to make a lot of increases in the field, but I'm so
depressed at how rare the pages are ... and so annoyed when the
paladin doing the ML loots a faded page and before I can say "Yay, can
I have that please" he goes and destroys it! Grrrr.

--
Melaniel, Wood Elf Bard (48) "Flirting is a girl's best friend"
Kalara, Enchanter (37) "LOADING, PLEASE WAIT ...."
Tura, Dark Elf Necromancer (10) "Jobantik, you really smell!"
